title: Why Donate Blood?
description: Every two seconds, someone needs blood. A single donation can save up to three lives, making you a true lifesaver.

title: Who Can Donate?
description: Healthy individuals aged 18â€“65, weighing at least 50kg, can donate. It's safe, quick, and highly impactful.

title: How Often?
description: You can donate whole blood every 3 months. Stay healthy and keep saving lives regularly.
